attributes.action: Improvements to road safety on the A5/Woodford Lane junction,Nuneaton
attributes.additional_details:
For improvements to take place to the above named junction which currently has no traffic control in place also to reduce speed and raise awareness of this junction by means of a roundabout or traffic lights.

Reduction of accidents/incidents/casualties & fatalities.

Cost and time saving to the emergency services dealing with the above on a regular basis.

Prevention of fatalities due to drivers having to take risks to exit or access the junction.
